animeTitle: Grendizer: Getter Robo G - Great Mazinger Kessen! Daikaijuu
animeDescription: A giant sea monster known as "Dragonsaurus" has emerged from out of nowhere, terrorizing the depths of the oceans. Great Mazinger, Grendizer and the Getter Robo G team join forces to combat the new threat. But their task becomes more complicated when Dragonsaurus swallows up Boss Borot and makes its way toward Tokyo.  (Source: ANN)
animeCharacters: ['Nagare, Ryouma', 'Kabuto, Kouji', 'Jin, Hayato', 'Fleed, Duke', 'Boss', 'Tsurugi, Tetsuya', 'Kuruma, Benkei']
